directions: Combine lime juice, oil, vinegar, soy sauce, ginger, and sugar in a small bowl. Scrape out pearls from finger lime and stir into vinaigrette. Spoon over oysters just before serving.
ingredients: 1 finger lime, halved lengthwise, or 1/2 lime, white pith and peel removed, finely chopped
title: Oysters with Finger Lime and Ginger Mignonette
